name: Wise
natural_language_description: 这是 Wise 节点。主要用于: Consume the Wise API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: account

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

profileId.name: profileId
profileId.description: ID of the user profile to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
profileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Profile Name or ID | 作用: ID of the user profile to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

borderlessAccountId.name: borderlessAccountId
borderlessAccountId.description: ID of the borderless account to retrieve the statement of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
borderlessAccountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Borderless Account Name or ID | 作用: ID of the borderless account to retrieve the statement of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

currency.name: currency
currency.description: Code of the currency of the borderless account to retrieve the statement of
currency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Currency | 作用: Code of the currency of the borderless account to retrieve the statement of

format.name: format
format.description: File format to retrieve the statement in
format.natural_language_description: 参数名: Format | 作用: File format to retrieve the statement in | 默认值: json

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Name of the file that will be downloaded
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: Name of the file that will be downloaded | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: reference (值: None) - Reference text to show in the recipient's bank statement

source.name: source
source.description: Code of the source currency to retrieve the exchange rate for
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Currency | 作用: Code of the source currency to retrieve the exchange rate for

target.name: target
target.description: Code of the target currency to retrieve the exchange rate for
target.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target Currency | 作用: Code of the target currency to retrieve the exchange rate for

targetAccountId.name: targetAccountId
targetAccountId.description: ID of the account that will receive the funds. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
targetAccountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target Account Name or ID | 作用: ID of the account that will receive the funds. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

amountType.name: amountType
amountType.description: Whether the amount is to be sent or received
amountType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount Type | 作用: Whether the amount is to be sent or received | 默认值: source

amount.name: amount
amount.description: Amount of funds for the quote to create
amount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount | 作用: Amount of funds for the quote to create | 默认值: 1

sourceCurrency.name: sourceCurrency
sourceCurrency.description: Code of the currency to send for the quote to create
sourceCurrency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Currency | 作用: Code of the currency to send for the quote to create

targetCurrency.name: targetCurrency
targetCurrency.description: Code of the currency to receive for the quote to create
targetCurrency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target Currency | 作用: Code of the currency to receive for the quote to create

quoteId.name: quoteId
quoteId.description: ID of the quote based on which to create the transfer
quoteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Quote ID | 作用: ID of the quote based on which to create the transfer | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

transferId.name: transferId
transferId.description: ID of the transfer to retrieve
transferId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Transfer ID | 作用: ID of the transfer to retrieve | (必填项)

downloadReceipt.name: downloadReceipt
downloadReceipt.description: Whether to download the transfer receipt as a PDF file. Only for executed transfers, having status 'Outgoing Payment Sent'.
downloadReceipt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Receipt | 作用: Whether to download the transfer receipt as a PDF file. Only for executed transfers, having status 'Outgoing Payment Sent'. | 默认值: False | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: range (值: None) - Range of time for filtering the transfers
sourceCurrency (值: None) - Code of the source currency for filtering the transfers
targetCurrency (值: None) - Code of the target currency for filtering the transfers
